first_para: Steven Marcus Woolfe (born 6 October 1967) is a British politician and barrister. Since his election in the 2014, he has been a Member of the European Parliament for the North West England region for the UK Independence Party. He is the UKIP Parliamentary candidate for Stockport in the 2015 General Election.

full.extract: Steven Marcus Woolfe (born 6 October 1967) is a British politician and barrister. full.title: Steven Woolfe
